biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Noel Gugliemi  (born 1970) is an American actor.
He was born in Santa Monica, California, to an Italian-American father and a Mexican-American mother. Gugliemi voiced the character of Cortez in the video game 187 Ride or Die. He is most noted for portraying a stereotypical southern Californian Latino gang member. In recent years, he has followed Christianity, and regularly does speeches at churches.
